title: Designing Activity-Based Pedagogy for Online Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: For in-service secondary mathematics teachers, there is a need to develop pedagogical methods for transitioning from face-to-face to online real-time instruction.

learning_goals: Learners can design activity-based math classes in online real-time environments
Learners can implement three or more types of interactive math learning activities using Zoom tools
Learners can apply a process for improving lesson design by analyzing formative assessment data

resources: Virtual Manipulatives for Math Education (e.g., GeoGebra)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
